final_answer: This image is funny and satirical because it juxtaposes two unconventional eating habits. In the first panel, the person is eating a pizza slice in the usual way, which seems normal. In the second panel, the person is eating a chocolate bar as if it were a hot dog, which is unexpected and humorous. The presence of hot dogs on the plate and chocolate bars in a glass adds to the absurdity by contrasting the conventional way of consuming these foods with the unusual method the person is using. This plays on the theme of humorously subverting everyday norms.
ground_truth: the irony in this image is that people waste pizza crust by saying that it is too hard, while they eat hard chocolate without any complaints
